metadata.title: Persistence of lymphocytopenia with CT abnormalities among patients with critical H7N9 swine-origin influenza A virus infection

abstract.original_text: We have shown the presence of radiographic abnormalities among H7N9 patients. Monitoring of the variation of lymphocytes for H7N9 patients has important clinical significance, especially for prediction of the resolution of pneumonitis.

sentences.segment_text: We have shown the presence of radiographic abnormalities among H7N9 patients .
Monitoring of the variation of lymphocytes for H7N9 patients has important clinical significance ,
especially for prediction of the resolution of pneumonitis .
